sections.heading: facility, defined.Treatment facility means a facility which is licensed to provide services for persons who are mentally ill or substance dependent or both

sections.text:
71-914.Treatment facility, defined.

Treatment facility means a facility which is licensed to provide services for persons who are mentally ill or substance dependent or both.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 806, § 6;Laws 1985, LB 252, § 1;Laws 1995, LB 275, § 24;R.S.1943, (1999), § 83-1006;Laws 2004, LB 1083, § 34.
